name: Ultimate Custom Night (itch) (TG20)
description: Ultimate custom night is a point and click survival horror video game developed by Scott Cawthon in 2018 and Features 50 selectable animatronic characters spanning seven Five Nights at Freddy's games, the options for customization are nearly endless. Mix and match any assortment of characters that you like, set their difficulty from 0-20, then jump right into the action!
